item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:6, topic:390243”]The second line is this;

if(c.Donatorreq < c.Donatorreq) {

If, for instance the Donatorreq was 1, that if statement would be the same as this.

if(1 < 1) {

Tell me, is 1 lower then 1?

tl;dr… How can a number be lower then itself?[/quote]
it cant so how do i fix it??

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:4, topic:390243”]Your first code is never going to work. You may wish to reread what the code actually says. More specifically, look at line 2.

if(c.Donatorreq > 0) { if(c.Donatorreq < c.Donatorreq) { c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to wear that item."); canWearItem = false; } } [/quote]
Im not sure on what you mean can u explain?

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Your first code is never going to work. You may wish to reread what the code actually says. More specifically, look at line 2.

if(c.Donatorreq > 0) {
   if(c.Donatorreq < c.Donatorreq) {
      c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to wear that item.");
      canWearItem = false;
   }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:2, topic:390243”][quote author=DannyBoy1995 link=topic=486153.msg3562558#msg3562558 date=1302389942]
Does this look right?
if(c.Donatorreq > 0) {
if(c.Donatorreq) < c.Donatorreq) {
c.sendMessage(“You must be a donator to wear that item.”);
canWearItem = false;
}
}
[/quote]
You had a “grammatical error”

if(c.Donatorreq > 0) {
   if(c.Donatorreq < c.Donatorreq) {
      c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to wear that item.");
      canWearItem = false;
   }
}

you had an extra ‘)’ at line 2 char 19[/quote]
Okay it worked but they are still able to spawn them is this right?
if(itemName.contains(“statius”)) {
c.defenceLevelReq = 78;
c.Donatorreq = 1;
}
if(itemName.contains(“bandos”)) {
c.defenceLevelReq = 65;
c.Donatorreq = 1;
}
if(itemName.contains(“chaotic”)) {
c.attackLevelReq = 80;
c.Donatorreq = 1;
}
if(itemName.contains(“vesta”)) {
c.defenceLevelReq = 78;
c.Donatorreq = 1;
}
if(itemName.contains(“armadyl godsword”)) {
c.attackLevelReq = 75;
c.Donatorreq = 1;
}
